div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren (The Swedish Courier, Weekly)March 4, 1915. [SOCIALISTS TO DISCUSS IMPORTANT TOPIC]

body.p: Lake View Scandinavian Socialist Club is arranging a debate in Winona Hall, 5124 North Clark Street, on Sunday at 3:00 o'clock P.M. Topic for debate, "Can the working people better take care of their interests by voting for the candidates of the Socialist party, or ought they vote for the candidates of the other parties."
